docs.text: German Cheat Sheet ¶ This documentation site is a quick-entry point to the German-Cheat-Sheet repository. Navigate using the sidebar to find grammar notes, vocabulary lists, practice material, and resources. This site is generated from markdown files in the repository. To build locally: pip install mkdocs mkdocs-material mkdocs serve Or to build a static site: mkdocs build
docs.title: Home
